artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige II; Publisher: Fujiokaya Keijirō
description: figures on road in front of buildings at right with red, blue and white cloths over doorways; two dogs in center near bottom; black birds flying in sky; from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Views of Famous Places in Edo (Edo meishō zue 江戸名勝圖會)
title: Daimon Street
